title: Skyway luggage tag script
content:
Any thoughts on this cool old script? The "y"s seem to match, so I think it's a typeface, but I could be mistaken.  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018073830im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stewardess_type_tag%20crop.jpg)
author: bshaykin

comments.content: Looks like something [Jason Walcott](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018073830/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jason%20Walcott) might've digitised, but no. :^/
I don't think it's a font. I have admired it for some time.
